item.title: has_duration
item.description: Predicate to describe the Duration of Audiobook, Episode, Event, MediaObject, Movie, MusicRecording, MusicRelease, QuantitativeValueDistribution, Schedule. [is_part_of:: ] Use it like this:

item.title: has_duration_of_activity
item.description: Predicate to describe the Duration of ExercisePlan. [is_part_of:: ] Use it like this: [has_duration_of_activity::P#Y#M#W#DT#H#M#s.fff] or [ #has_/duration/_of_activity::P#Y#M#W#DT#H#M#s.fff] with the ISO_8601-Duration Format .
